document_data.name: ''Fallorain's Plate''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Fallorain's Plate''''' was a set of [[enchanted]] [[plate mail]], worn by Captain [[Fallorain]] of [[Calimshan]], sometime before [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Description: This set of armor was a combination of [[chain armor]] and plates of hard steel that shielded vital areas of the wearer. Metal plates were placed to protect chest, abdomen, and groin areas.
document_data.History:
This plate mail belonged to Captain Fallorain, the leader of Calimshan's 12{{th}} [[Cavalier|cavalry]] brigade. The commander wore this enchanted armor to the [[Battle of the Spider Swamp]], where he and his comrades met their doom battling some evil whose name was lost to history.

With time, several copies of this enchanted plate mail were created.
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Genthore]]: a [[human]] adventurer who was hired to defend the [[Cloakwood mine]] ''circa'' 1368 DR.
*[[Gorch the Armorer]]: a [[dwarf]] heavy armor merchant in [[Baeloth Barrityl]]'s [[Black Pits]] in the [[Underdark]].
*[[Odren]]: a devotee of [[Helm]] and one of the [[Knights of the Vigil]], in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
